column1: Uchi////The only soup they serve here is Miso
column2: however it's not listed on the menu
column3: so you have to specifically request it. I order the Shag roll
column4: which is an 8 piece fried sushi plate with white aeole chili sauce and as squid ink drizzle. I was like WTF when I first saw it
column5: but it's actually really good and filling. The iced tea brew was a little strong
column6: but some water and lemon fixed that. The water served was unfiltered tap and not very cold
column7: though. The menu is also quite narrow when compared to other Asian cuisine places; it's mainly sushi and booze.
